channel.title: Framer Square Pos on IvanF.
channel.description: Recent content in Framer Square Pos on IvanF.

item.title: Square Register might have a UX problem in night clubs
item.description: At 2AM on a cold Saturday night I was standing on the upper level of a nightclub, observing the party below. The dance floor has gone wild and the bar is crowded. Behind the bar, couple of waiters were running wild trying to keep up with the orders. And they were doing a damn good job. I wondered how long it would take for me to get this good. The POS software they used was the most popular POS in Adriatic nightclubs and restaurants.
